Title: Wii Media Controller
Description: Wii Media Controller is a remote controller for your Windows Media Player & iTunes media players, it will help you control your media player at home or at parties from distance. It is based on Brian Peek's WiimoteLib library. It's developed using C# programming language.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Wii Media Controller is a remote controller for your Windows Media Player & iTunes media players, it will help you control your media player at home or at parties from distance. It is based on Brian Peek's WiimoteLib library. It's developed using C# programming language.

Here you can find both the source code and binary for the Wii Media Controller software.
